phrases: Hold the pedal a little longer.
That is what I am doing!
Play it with a little more emotion.
Try and grasp the form for the time being.
Once you grasp the feel of it, your emotions will be able to flow freely.
For example, if you smile when you are sad, your sadness will lessen.
I do not understand what you are saying, sensei!
Maybe that analogy was a little too difficult.
She talks like an adult, but she is still...
Do not treat me like a child, Mama!
Sensei, is there a full moon out tonight?
I cannot see it, but I can feel its silver glow.
Are you sure the people looking for us are already here?
It was information from above, so keep your eyes open.
We have become popular, have not we?
She cannot even fulfill her only purpose.
Number Six's lips look discolored to me.
Increase the sodium concentration by point zero-one.
Everything is going according to standard procedure.
Recognize the differences between them, and do not rely so much on monitors and instruments.
They are delicate in body and soul.
His lips seemed to move, as if he was talking in his sleep.
He might have been seeing a dream.
I know it is been proven that they do not dream.
Then again, maybe they can experience it...
Chief Ishizaki, there are some changes in the observer apparitions currently on patrol.
Several are gathering near a specific coordinate.
I thought I told you not to go out alone.
Well, it looked like he was spying on us.
He might have been from a higher level.
Let me remind you that our job is to identify their numbers, identities, and abilities.
We are not supposed to kill them.
What the hell is going on?
The only explanation I can think of is that they might have been captured.
A contractor that can capture observer apparitions?
My mind suddenly synced with a doll that sent out an observer apparition.
It is not a good feeling.
This is too good to be true.
It looks like I was able to establish a connection with one of our targets.
I am surprised you were able to see her in this picture!
You want me to find this girl, right?
But Mr. Foreigner, um... Mr. Kashite... Kashite... Kashite...
You have come to the right place!
A famous pianist like yourself, coming all the way from Scandinavia to hire me, Kurasawa Gai...
I did not know you were well-known overseas, boss.
I have been saying that I am Gai, Gai Kurasawa.
You are relatively calm about this.
You have identified the target, have not you?
Are not you going to make your move?
It is not difficult to lure a doll out.
If it has not recovered from last night's incident, it will just wander about
By the way, do you have any cigarettes?
Is it okay for you to smoke?
Are not you supposed to be a singer?
That is a mean way of saying it.
I stood on the stage of Volksoper a long time ago, you know.
I was one of many, though.
It is a problem if I run out,
A maiden stands still by the lake in the midnight sun, falling into the bright night alone.
The blank, cold, silver moon, her only companion.
It is a little too feminine, though.
It would be better if you made it rhyme.
Do not look into it too much.
I have never written a poem in my entire life
You still have a soul capable of functioning,
even if it is someone like you.
I have not been able to contact Yin since last night.
There is no way a doll could act on its own.
She is only been programmed with enough information necessary to live.
One of the syndicate's men was murdered.
This occurred last night as well.
Was it the work of the group that infiltrated the area?
There is a possibility that Yin was abducted by them.
In an effort to acquire information about us.
She does not have any emotions, but unfortunately for us, she has a great memory.
The syndicate was aware of it, then?
They have also been keeping tabs on us.
If worst comes to worst, dispose of the doll.
Hey, you are in the way!
She is not here, as I thought.
We are going to ask questions around here, Kiko.
Did not I tell you I was going to take the rest of the day off?
I only tagged along because it was on the way.
He is looking for Yin for some reason.
Let me know if anything happens.
Are you saying I should follow him?
He knows what I look like.
Episode Thirteen A Heart Unswaying on the Water's Surface... (Part One)
No, I just dropped my penlight.
Oh, let me turn on the lights.
No, I like things as they are.
I think it is around here.
Who do they think they are trying to fool?
I cannot let that writer live.
I am going to write his name in my notebook.
Geez, even though the artwork was amazing...
That is why they should not make adaptations in the first place!
Refills are free, so you do not have to drink sparingly.
Is that part of your character?
Take my advice and try to smile,
First of all, you have to establish your external features,
whether it is for cosplay or anything else.
Bring me some coffee on the way back.
Is not there something that I would recognize around there?
There is an anime shop on the corner...
We are splitting the bill, you know.
You were lured by your own observer apparition,
I can read a doll's mind.
I will not let you get away!
Get as far away as you can.
Bertha, were you trying to get me killed, too?
Did not I tell you this was my remuneration?
Investigations are currently underway, but it will take some time to determine the because.
Only until she is able to leave the country.
I do not want to impose, but why was she there in the first place?
To tell you the truth, I do not know.
I only know she was being chased.
Listen, it is already become a huge story.
There is no doubt about it.
Kirsi-chan, you should stay at my place.
I want to dress you up in...
Well, I suppose I have no choice, since we are already in the same predicament.
That aside, where can we hide her?
There has to be at least one!
What do you mean by at least one?
Everyone is looking forward to it.
What is the meaning of this?
Not only did you lose sight of the enemy, but you also lost Yin!
The next time you see Yin, kill her, regardless of the situation.
Do not you think we will be playing into the enemy's hand if we become disorganized now?
I am not your ally, you know.
Do not treat me as one of your own kind.
We do not regard you as one of us.
Contractors like us do not possess emotions that would make us tremble in fear like you.
You do not know how frightening the syndicate can be.
If you will not, I will.
Why did you have to come along?
It would be unfair if you went without me.
I was the one who suggested a hot spring!
Let us go back once everything settles down, Kirsi.
The train never had a destination.
The drizzling rain reveals a secret crime.
An unwavering heart, a resolute mind.
You cannot be hurt any further.
Are the days that have disappeared with the moonlight asking for atonement?
The light she felt in the past cannot reach her anymore.
Episode Fourteen A Heart Unswaying on the Water's Surface... (Part Two)
